src:
Berperan dalam Pendidikan, detikcom Raih Penghargaan dari UI
01 Nov 2019, 22:29 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - detikcom menerima penghargaan dalam Universitas Indonesia (UI) Awarding Night. detikcom dianggap sebagai media yang berperan dalam bidang pendidikan penelitian dan pengabdian masyarakatnya.
Pengharapan itu diberikan dalam acara UI Awarding Night di Menara BNI, Jalan Pejompongan Raya, Jakarta Pusat, Jumat (1/11/2019). Beberapa media lainnya juga mendapat penghargaan serupa.
Plakat penghargaan itu diserahkan langsung Direktur Pengembangan Karir dan Hubungan Alumni, Erwin Nurdin. Penghargaan itu diterima Wapemred detikcom, Elvan Dany Sutrisno.
"Pemberian penghargaan ini merupakan ucapan terima kasih dan bentuk apresiasi UI kepada segenap mitra UI yang senantiasa mendukung penyelenggaraan Tri Dharma Perguruan Tinggi UI, baik itu penelitian, pendidikan maupun pengabdian masyarakat," kata Rektor UI, Prof. Muhammad Anis dalam sambutannya saat membuka UI Awarding Night, di Menara BNI, Jalan Pejompongan Raya, Jakarta Pusat, Jumat (1/10/2019).


Penghargaan UI Awarding Night diterima Wapemred detikcom, Elvan Dany Sutrisno (kedua dari kiri). (Foto: Tim detikcom)

Pada kategori pendidikan, penghargaan diberikan kepada 115 pihak baik pribadi, lembaga pemerintah maupun swasta. Penghargaan juga diberikan pada asosiasi nasional dan internasional yang dianggap berjasa memajukan pendidikan di UI.
Pada kategori penelitian, penghargaan diberikan kepada 34 pihak yang terdiri dari perusahaan maupun individu yang telah berkolaborasi dengan UI. Penghargaan juga diberikan kepada 40 pihak di kategori pengabdian masyarakat.
Selain itu, 24 pengharapan juga diberikan pada Alumni UI inspiratif, 30 pengharapan untuk media massa, serta 4 penghargaan untuk Unit Kerja Khusus Pelayanan dan Pengabdian Masyarakat.

(abw/dkp)
text:
Role in Education, detikcom Wins Award from UI
Nov 01 2019, 22:29 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - detikcom received an award at the University of Indonesia (UI) Awarding Night. detikcom is considered as a media that plays a role in the field of research education and community service.
Hope was given at the UI Awarding Night at Menara BNI, Jalan Pejompongan Raya, Central Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019). Several other media also received similar awards.
The award plaque was handed over directly by the Director of Career Development and Alumni Relations, Erwin Nurdin. The award was received by Deputy Editor in Chief, Elvan Dany Sutrisno.
"The awarding is a form of gratitude and appreciation from UI to all UI partners who always support the implementation of Tri Dharma University of UI, be it research, education or community service," said UI Rector Prof. Muhammad Anis in his remarks when opening UI Awarding Night, at BNI Tower, Jalan Pejompongan Raya, Central Jakarta, Friday (10/10/2019).


The UI Awarding Night award was received by Deputy Editor in Chief, Elvan Dany Sutrisno (second from left). (Photo: Tim detikcom)

In the education category, awards were given to 115 parties both private, government and private institutions. Awards are also given to national and international associations that are considered to be instrumental in advancing education at UI.
In the research category, awards were given to 34 parties consisting of companies and individuals who had collaborated with UI. The award was also given to 40 parties in the category of community service.
In addition, 24 expectations were also given to the inspiring UI Alumni, 30 hopes for mass media, and 4 awards for the Special Service Unit and Community Service.

(abw / dkp)
